name.ja: ロイヤルデモンズ・ガーディアン

requirement.en: If your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or higher monster on their field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This turn, this face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Fiend Type monster in Attack Position. Then, if your opponent has 2 or more monsters on their field, increase this card's Level by 1 until the end of this turn.
